Lord of Seagard014583kemeuybor1gica443a7t5t01z09jv4n1546162014-07-24T22:03:39ZCorneliusAgrippa5753603[[File:Seagard attack.png|250px|right|thumb|Castle Seagard, seat of the Lord of Seagard.]]
'''Lord of Seagard''' is a title held by the ruler of the castle [[Seagard]], located in the town of Seagard in the [[Riverlands]]. The castle was built during the [[Greyjoy Rebellion]] to defend the coast from [[Ironborn]] reavers. The head of [[House Mallister]] is the Lord of Seagard. The present Lord is [[Jason Mallister]].
